ovdesc.p: This file contains details for portfolio monthly exclusion from composite performance calculation
It's structure is : 1 record per composite, per month and per portfolio.
This file is monthly updated by composite batch.
See also files : AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.DETAIL, AM.COMPOSITE.HIST and AM.COMPOSITE.YEARLY.HIST

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The ID of the protfolio that has been excluded

This field contains the code of exclusion from monthly composite performance calculation.
Must be a valid record in the AM.COMPOSITE.EXCL.CODE table
